texto: the Knowledge Management process. 4) Reuse, recycle, recondition, overhaul, archive, or destroy designated software system elements. NOTE Handle system elements and their parts that are not intended for reuse in a manner that will assure they do not get back into the supply chain. 5) Conduct destruction of the system elements, as necessary, to reduce the amount of waste treatment or to make the waste easier to handle. NOTE When the element is non‐maintainable or non‐recyclable, it is necessary to prevent the elements from getting back into the supply chain, e.g., complete erasure of all software from all system storage media and removal of license keys, data, and interfaces.
